name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, particularly proficient in **Python**, **JavaScript**, and **PHP**. Expertise in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Vue.js**, and **Node.js**. Skilled in implementing scalable architectures and deploying robust applications while maintaining high code quality using **Git** for version control.

Deep experience with frameworks such as **Symfony** for backend development, ensuring compliance-driven solutions tailored for the healthcare and financial sectors. Proven ability in building and integrating user-centric systems with advancements in AI/ML, driving efficiency through automation and predictive analytics. Adept at utilizing cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure** alongside CI/CD practices to enhance deployment workflows. A strong foundation in MLOps methodologies complements my technical repertoire, which includes model training and orchestration using tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow**.

Developed and maintained RESTful APIs with **Symfony**, ensuring seamless interaction with frontend components and third-party services.
Led system upgrades, transitioning legacy PHP applications to modern frameworks, improving system reliability and maintainability.

Participated in code reviews and mentoring sessions, enhancing team skill levels and promoting knowledge sharing.
Adopted Agile methodologies, enabling iterative project development and quicker response to change requests.

Utilized **Python** and **JavaScript** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Implemented responsive front-end applications using **React (18)** and **Vue.js** to create interactive, user-friendly interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Employed version **3.0** of **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded** to deliver real-time analytics dashboards, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies.

Optimized server-side logic and database interactions to handle a transaction volume of over **1,000** transactions per minute without performance lag, improving the platform's reliability and speed.
Created a modular component library in **JavaScript** for reusable UI elements, facilitating a **50%** reduction in development time for new features.
Conducted code reviews and pair programming sessions to elevate team coding standards and mentorship among junior developers, leading to a **20%** increase in overall code quality.
Collaborated on developing CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment, reducing deployment time from hours to minutes and ensuring a swift, error-free release process.
Engaged in cross-functional team collaborations, providing technical expertise and ensuring that all developments align with business objectives and user needs.
